gaidda.name: Black Cat
gaidda.playText: Whenever you discard a card, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 3 to draw a card.

gaidda.name: Elven Librarian
gaidda.playText: Whenever you draw a card, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 5 to draw a card.

gaidda.name: Lake of Purity
gaidda.playText: Whenever you draw a card, earn a coin.

gaidda.name: Greedy Vulture
gaidda.useText: Trade a card to earn 3 coins.
gaidda.playText: As an action, give a card to earn 4 coins.

gaidda.name: Lonely Wolf
gaidda.useText: Give a card to earn 5 coins.
gaidda.playText: Whenever a card is given to other player, earn a coin.

gaidda.name: Elven Hunter
gaidda.useText: Discard a card to deal 2 damage.
gaidda.playText: Whenever you discard a card, deal 1 damage.

gaidda.name: Poisonous Spider
gaidda.playText: Whenever you make someone discard a card, draw a card.

gaidda.name: Omont: The Bear King
gaidda.useText: Deal 2 damage to force the owner to discard a card.
gaidda.playText: Whenever you deal 2 or more damage, force the target's owner to discard a card.

gaidda.name: Haund: Ancient Tree
gaidda.useText: Draw 2 cards from either the deck or the discard pile.
gaidda.playText: As an action, pay a coin to draw a card from the discard pile.

gaidda.name: Sokel: Druid of Gaidda
gaidda.playText: Whenever anyone gives a card, you have priority. If you weren't the target, draw a card.

gaidda.name: Baby Sapling
gaidda.useText: Draw a card to make every player draw a card
gaidda.playText: Whenever you draw a card, charge 1. Uncharge 6 and sacrifice this to draw 6.

gaidda.name: Wanta: Dragon of Life
gaidda.useText: Draw a card from any graveyard 3 times.
gaidda.playText: Whenever a player obtains a card from any source, you may discard a card to force that player to give you that card.

noumi.name: Banker Gnome
noumi.playText: Whenever you earn coins, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 5 to earn 3 coins.

noumi.name: Traveling Salesman
noumi.playText: Whenever you draw a card, you may discard it to earn 3 coins.

noumi.name: Lake of Riches
noumi.playText: Whenever you lose coins, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 3 to deal 1 damage.

noumi.name: Humble Noble
noumi.playText: Whenever you lose coins, charge 1. If this has 3 counters, uncharge it to steal a coin.

noumi.name: Greedy Wizard
noumi.playText: Whenever you profit, profit 1 extra for every 3 coins of profit.

noumi.name: Mercenary
noumi.useText: Lose 4 coins to deal 1 damage twice.
noumi.playText: As an action, lose 3 coins to deal 1 damage.

noumi.name: Shiny Knight
noumi.playText: Whenever you use coins, charge 1. If this has 3, uncharge it to make a player lose 3 coins.

noumi.name: Royal Mint
noumi.playText: At the end of the turn, earn a coin.

noumi.name: Edenwr: Duke of Einde
noumi.playText: Whenever a player plays a card, steal 1 from that player.

noumi.name: Anangith: High Inquisitor
noumi.useText: Sacrifice a card you own to earn 15 coins.
noumi.playText: Whenever a card you own dies, earn 5 coins.

noumi.name: Beggar
noumi.useText: Earn 3 coins to make every player earn 3 coins.
noumi.playText: Whenever you earn coins, charge one. Uncharge 6 and sacrifice this to earn 18.

noumi.name: Veynu: Dragon of Greed
noumi.useText: Give any amount of coins to a player to take control of a card they own for double the value paid.
noumi.playText: Whenever any player spends gold, you can pay the same amount +2. If you do, you steal whatever effect they did.

ysault.name: Blacksmith
ysault.playText: After the end of your turn, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 3 to give 1 power.

ysault.name: War Horse
ysault.playText: Whenever you deal damage from other sources, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to deal 1 damage.

ysault.name: Lake of Power
ysault.playText: Whenever your cards are dealt damage, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to deal 1 damage.

ysault.name: Berserker
ysault.useText: Deal 1 damage to a card you own to deal 2 damage.
ysault.playText: As an action, deal 1 damage to this card to deal 1 damage. While this has 1 hp, at the end of the turn deal 1 damage.

ysault.name: Elite Archer
ysault.useText: Discard a card to deal 2 damage.
ysault.playText: At the end of the turn, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 3 to deal 2 damage.

ysault.name: War Mage
ysault.playText: Whenever you lose blood drops, give 1 power to another card.

ysault.name: Dread Catapult
ysault.useText: Choose a player. At the end of the next turn, that player deals 1 damage to a card they own twice.
ysault.playText: Whenever a card you own is killed, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 1 to trigger its use effect.

ysault.name: Hisju: Hired Assassin
ysault.useText: Lose 9 coins to kill any non-legendary card.
ysault.playText: At the end of the turn, lose 2 coins. If you don't, sacrifice this. If you do, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 4 to kill any card.

ysault.name: Edoura: Necromancer
ysault.playText: Whenever a card you own is killed, charge 1. Uncharge 4 to resurrect any card. As an action, sacrifice a card to earn a blood drop.

ysault.name: Orsonn: Ysault's General
ysault.useText: Deal 1 damage to a card you own to give 3 power to another card.
ysault.playText: At the end of the turn, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to give 1 power to every other card you own.

ysault.name: Rookie Squire
ysault.useText: Deal 1 damage to make every player deal 1 damage.
ysault.playText: Whenever you deal damage, charge 1. Uncharge 6 and sacrifice this to give 1 power 6 times.

ysault.name: Nethse: Dragon of War
ysault.useText: Every other player must deal 3 damage to a card they own. If it dies, they give you a blood drop.
ysault.playText: Whenever damage is dealt to one of your cards, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to choose a player and deal 1 damage to every card that player owns. Repeat this effect for every 3 extra power this has.

seraneri.name: Streets Informant
seraneri.playText: Whenever any player sees, see the same thing.

seraneri.name: Clairvoyant
seraneri.playText: At the end of the turn, see 1.

seraneri.name: Magic Tinkerer
seraneri.playText: At the end of the turn, you may lose 1 coin to charge 1. Uncharge 3 to discover 1.

seraneri.name: Old Wizard
seraneri.useText: Request a card. If you get it, give a coin to the former owner.
seraneri.playText: Whenever you see, charge 1. Uncharge 5 to request a card.

seraneri.name: Plarath's Apprentice
seraneri.useText: Alter the future 3. Then draw a card.
seraneri.playText: Whenever the deck is maniputaled, see 3 and charge 1. As an action, uncharge 1 to draw a card.

seraneri.name: Magic Swordsman
seraneri.useText: Deal 1 damage. If this kills, request a card from the owner.
seraneri.playText: Whenever you see, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to deal 1 damage.

seraneri.name: Ghenbe: The Dragon Summoner
seraneri.useText: Find a non-legendary card. If it is common, find another common card. If it is rare, earn 3.
seraneri.playText: Whenever other source manipulates the deck, charge 1. Uncharge 6 to find a legendary card.

seraneri.name: Simsi: The Time Weaver
seraneri.useText: See 6. Then choose one: your next turn you have an extra action or make an opponent lose an action.
seraneri.playText: At the end of the turn, charge 1. Uncharge 5 to have an extra action this turn. As an action, you may uncharge 3 to make an opponent lose their next turn.

seraneri.name: Plarath: Grand Archmage
seraneri.useText: Alter the future 6. Then draw 2 cards.
seraneri.playText: Whenever other source manipulates the deck, alter the future 2 and draw a card.

seraneri.name: Unreadable Spellbook
seraneri.playText: Whenever anyone sees, charge 1. Uncharge 12 to alter the future 15. Then draw 5 cards.

seraneri.name: Mithes: Dragon of Magic
seraneri.playText: Whenever other player sees, you may see it aswell and charge one. Uncharge 3 to request a card.

boumandow.name: Convenient NPC
boumandow.playText: Whenever you don't have a side quest, create a side quest. If the side side quest is fulfilled, sacrifice this to discover a random effect magnified by 6.

boumandow.name: Suspicious Beverage
boumandow.playText: At the end of the turn, charge 1. If this is killed, play a random effect magnified by half the amount of charges.

boumandow.name: Lake of Mystery
boumandow.playText: At the end of the turn, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to play a random effect.

boumandow.name: Forbidden Ritual
boumandow.useText: Discard the top card of the deck. Cast it's use effect.
boumandow.playText: Draw a random condition. Whenever it is met, charge 1. Uncharge 9 to play the top card of the deck for free.

boumandow.name: Pandora's Box
boumandow.playText: When this is played, create a side quest. If it is fulfilled, sacrifice this to play a card from your hand for free. Then, play a random effect magnified by 3.

boumandow.name: Exiled Warlock
boumandow.useText: Play a random effect magnified by 2.
boumandow.playText: Get a random player passive while this is in play. Magnify it by 2.

boumandow.name: Unleashed Genie
boumandow.useText: Every other player plays a common card for free. Then, play 5 random effects.
boumandow.playText: Whenever a card is played, cast its use effect if possible and deal 1 damage to this.

boumandow.name: Andis: The Tempest Caller
boumandow.useText: Discover a random effect magnified by 3. If the target is not you, cast it on every other player.
boumandow.playText: Whenever you play a random effect on a player that is not you, play it on every other player.

boumandow.name: Herkil: Hesif's Herald
boumandow.useText: Sacrifice a card to get a blood drop. Then, cast its use effect magnified by 3.
boumandow.playText: Whenever a card is killed, you may cast its use effect.

boumandow.name: Meathegs: Bumandow's Prophet
boumandow.useText: Discover a new permanent game rule.
boumandow.playText: At the end of the turn, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to discover a permanent game rule. Uncharge 6 to discover a new permanent player passive.

boumandow.name: Mysterious Chest
boumandow.useText: Every player plays a random effect.
boumandow.playText: Whenever a random effect is played, charge 1. Uncharge 6 to sacrifice this and get a random permanent player passive.

boumandow.name: Hedreada: Dragon of Chaos
boumandow.useText: Every player may play a Bumandow card for free. Then, every other player must give all their cards.
boumandow.playText: At the end of the turn, discard the top card. You may trigger its use effect. As an action, you may choose to discover a permanent player passive. If you do, give control of this to any other player.

hesif.name: Trapped Chest
hesif.useText: Spend a blood drop to make a player sacrifice a card of their choice.
hesif.playText: Whenever one of your cards is killed, get a blood drop.

hesif.name: Poison Dealer
hesif.useText: Spend a blood drop to make a player discard 2 cards of their choice.
hesif.playText: Draw a card for each blood drop spent.

hesif.name: Lake of Decay
hesif.useText: Spend a blood drop to make a player lose 2 blood drops.
hesif.playText: At the end of the turn, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to earn a blood drop.

hesif.name: Undead Horse
hesif.useText: Spend 2 blood drops to make a player deal 4 damage to a card of their choice, 3 times.
hesif.playText: Killing cards gives you an extra blood drop.

hesif.name: Corrupted Noble
hesif.useText: Spend 2 blood drops to make a player give you 5 coins and a card.
hesif.playText: Earn 4 coins for each blood drop spent.

hesif.name: Demonic Portal
hesif.useText: Spend 2 blood drops to return a card of your choice to its owner's hand for each other player.
hesif.playText: As an action, you may spend 3 blood drops to play a card from your graveyard for free.

hesif.name: Possessed Child
hesif.useText: Spend 2 blood drops to make every other player sacrifice a card of their choice.
hesif.playText: At the end of the turn, you may spend 1 blood drop to either draw 3 cards or earn 9 coins. If you do not, give control of this to another player.

hesif.name: Avicath: Failed Experiment
hesif.useText: Spend 3 blood drops to take control of the target non-legendary card.
hesif.playText: At the end of the turn, give 1 power to this. If this has 6 or more, give it 2 instead. As an action, you may sacrifice this to earn as many blood drops as half its power.

hesif.name: Sze: Assassin Shade
hesif.useText: Spend 4 blood drops to kill 2 cards. Don't get any blood drop for it.
hesif.playText: At the end of the turn, you may spend a blood drop to charge 1. If you do not, sacrifice this. Uncharge 2 to kill a card.

hesif.name: Fronnavou: Cursed King
hesif.useText: Spend 3 blood drops to sacrifice a card. Then, trigger its use effect 3 times.
hesif.playText: Whenever you sacrifice a card, you may spend a blood drop to take control of another one of the same rarity.

hesif.name: Evil Sapling
hesif.useText: Every player loses a blood drop, discards a card, sacrifices a card and loses 5 coins.
hesif.playText: Whenever you spend blood drops, charge 1. Uncharge 6 and sacrifice this to earn 6 blood drops.

hesif.name: Porasmes: Dragon of Corruption
hesif.useText: Spend 5 blood drops to choose any 3 Hesif cards you can see. Show them. Trigger their use effects in any order.
hesif.playText: At the end of the turn, choose one: earn a blood drop, deal 3 damage, draw 3 cards, give 3 power or earn 9 coins. You may spend a blood drop to magnify by 2.
